verses.verse: <S%H5315><s%>"'If anyone sins, <S%H2398><s%> in that he hears <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of adjuration, <S%H423><s%> he being a witness, <S%H5707><s%> whether <S%H176><s%> he has seen <S%H7200><s%> or known, <S%H3045><s%> if he doesn't <S%H5046><s%> report it, <S%H5375><s%> then he shall bear his iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>

<S%H5315><s%>"'Or if anyone touches <S%H5060><s%> any unclean <S%H2931><s%> thing, <S%H1697><s%> whether it is the carcass <S%H5038><s%> of an unclean <S%H2931><s%> animal, <S%H2416><s%> or the carcass <S%H5038><s%> of unclean <S%H2931><s%> livestock, <S%H929><s%> or the carcass <S%H5038><s%> of unclean <S%H2931><s%> creeping things, <S%H8318><s%> and it is hidden <S%H5956><s%> from him, <S%H2931><s%> and he is unclean, then he shall be guilty. <S%H816><s%>

<S%H5060><s%>"'Or if he touches the uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> whatever his uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> is with which he is unclean, <S%H2930><s%> and it is hidden <S%H5956><s%> from him; <S%H3045><s%> when he knows of it, <S%H816><s%> then he shall be guilty.

<S%H5315><s%>"'Or if anyone swears <S%H7650><s%> rashly <S%H981><s%> with his lips <S%H8193><s%> to do evil, <S%H7489><s%> or to do good, <S%H3190><s%> whatever it is that a man <S%H120><s%> might utter rashly <S%H981><s%> with an oath, <S%H7621><s%> and it is hidden <S%H5956><s%> from him; <S%H3045><s%> when he knows of it, <S%H816><s%> then he shall be guilty of one of these. <S%H259><s%>
It shall be, <S%H816><s%> when he is guilty of one <S%H259><s%> of these, <S%H3034><s%> he shall confess that in which he has sinned: <S%H2398><s%>

and he shall bring <S%H935><s%> his trespass offering <S%H817><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> for his sin <S%H2403><s%> which he has sinned, <S%H2398><s%> a female <S%H5347><s%> from the flock, <S%H6629><s%> a lamb <S%H3776><s%> or a <S%H8166><s%> goat, <S%H8166><s%> for a sin offering; <S%H2403><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for him concerning his sin. <S%H2403><s%>

<S%H3027><s%>"'If he can't <S%H1767><s%> afford a <S%H5060><s%> lamb, <S%H7716><s%> then he <S%H3027><s%> shall bring <S%H5060><s%> his trespass <S%H817><s%> offering for <S%H854><s%> that in which he has sinned, <S%H8147><s%> two turtledoves, <S%H8449><s%> or two <S%H8147><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> pigeons, <S%H3123><s%> to Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> one <S%H259><s%> for a sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> and the other <S%H259><s%> for a burnt offering. <S%H2403><s%>

He shall bring <S%H935><s%> them to the priest, <S%H3548><s%> who shall first offer <S%H7126><s%> the one which is for the sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> and <S%H7223><s%> wring off <S%H4454><s%> its head <S%H7218><s%> from <S%H4136><s%> its neck, <S%H6203><s%> but shall not sever it completely. <S%H914><s%>

He shall sprinkle <S%H5137><s%> some of the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the sin offering <S%H2403><s%> on the side <S%H7023><s%> of the altar; <S%H4196><s%> and the rest <S%H7604><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be drained out <S%H4680><s%> at the base <S%H3247><s%> of the altar. <S%H4196><s%> It is a sin offering. <S%H2403><s%>

He shall offer <S%H6213><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> for a burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> according to the ordinance; <S%H4941><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for him concerning his sin <S%H2403><s%> which he has sinned, <S%H2398><s%> and he shall be forgiven. <S%H5545><s%>

<S%H3027><s%>"'But if he can't <S%H5381><s%> afford two <S%H8147><s%> turtledoves, <S%H8449><s%> or two <S%H8147><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> pigeons, <S%H3123><s%> then he shall bring <S%H935><s%> his offering <S%H7133><s%> for that in which he has sinned, <S%H2398><s%> the tenth <S%H6224><s%> part of an ephah <S%H374><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> for a sin offering. <S%H2403><s%> He shall put <S%H7760><s%> no oil <S%H8081><s%> on it, <S%H5414><s%> neither shall he put any frankincense <S%H3828><s%> on it, <S%H2403><s%> for it is a sin offering.

He shall bring <S%H935><s%> it to the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H7061><s%> his handful <S%H4393><s%> of it as the memorial <S%H234><s%> portion, <S%H6999><s%> and burn it on the altar, <S%H4196><s%> on the offerings of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> made by fire. <S%H801><s%> It is a sin offering. <S%H2403><s%>

The priest <S%H3548><s%> shall make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for him concerning his sin <S%H2403><s%> that he has sinned <S%H2398><s%> in any <S%H259><s%> of these things, <S%H5545><s%> and he will be forgiven; and the rest shall be the priest <S%H3548><s%>'s, as the meal offering. <S%H4503><s%>'"

"If anyone <S%H5315><s%> commits <S%H4603><s%> a trespass, <S%H4604><s%> and sins <S%H4604><s%> unwittingly, <S%H7684><s%> in the holy things <S%H6944><s%> of Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> then he shall bring <S%H935><s%> his trespass <S%H817><s%> offering to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> a ram <S%H352><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%> from the flock, <S%H6629><s%> according to your estimation <S%H6187><s%> in silver <S%H3701><s%> by shekels, <S%H8255><s%> after the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> for a trespass offering. <S%H817><s%>

He shall make restitution <S%H7999><s%> for that which he has done wrong <S%H2398><s%> in the holy thing, <S%H6944><s%> and shall add <S%H3254><s%> a fifth part <S%H2549><s%> to it, <S%H5414><s%> and give it to the priest; <S%H3548><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for him with the ram <S%H352><s%> of the trespass offering, <S%H817><s%> and he will be forgiven. <S%H5545><s%>

"If anyone <S%H5315><s%> sins, <S%H2398><s%> and does <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H259><s%> of the things which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has commanded <S%H4687><s%> not to be done; <S%H6213><s%> though he didn't <S%H3045><s%> know it, <S%H816><s%> yet he is guilty, and shall bear <S%H5375><s%> his iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>

He shall bring <S%H935><s%> a ram <S%H352><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%> from of the flock, <S%H6629><s%> according to your estimation, <S%H6187><s%> for a trespass offering, <S%H817><s%> to the priest; <S%H3548><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for him concerning the thing <S%H7684><s%> in which he sinned <S%H7683><s%> and didn't <S%H3045><s%> know it, <S%H5545><s%> and he will be forgiven.
It is a trespass offering. <S%H817><s%> He is certainly <S%H816><s%> guilty <S%H816><s%> before Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>"
